019package com.plotsquared.core.command;
020
021import com.google.inject.Inject;
022import com.plotsquared.core.configuration.caption.TranslatableCaption;
023import com.plotsquared.core.location.Location;
024import com.plotsquared.core.permissions.Permission;
025import com.plotsquared.core.player.PlotPlayer;
026import com.plotsquared.core.plot.Plot;
027import com.plotsquared.core.plot.PlotArea;
028import com.plotsquared.core.plot.world.PlotAreaManager;
029import com.plotsquared.core.util.Permissions;
030import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal2;
031import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.RunnableVal3;
032import net.kyori.adventure.text.Component;
033import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.Tag;
034import net.kyori.adventure.text.minimessage.tag.resolver.TagResolver;
035import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
036
037import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
038
039@CommandDeclaration(usage = "/plot move <X;Z>",
040        command = "move",
041        permission = "plots.move",
042        category = CommandCategory.CLAIMING,
043        requiredType = RequiredType.PLAYER)
044public class Move extends SubCommand {
045
046    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
047
048    @Inject
049    public Move(final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager) {
050        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public CompletableFuture<Boolean> execute(
055            PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args,
056            RunnableVal3<Command, Runnable, Runnable> confirm,
057            RunnableVal2<Command, CommandResult> whenDone
058    ) {
059        Location location = player.getLocation();
060        Plot plot1 = location.getPlotAbs();
061        if (plot1 == null) {
062            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.not_in_plot"));
063            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
064        }
065        if (!plot1.isOwner(player.getUUID()) && !Permissions
066                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN)) {
067            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_plot_perms"));
068            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
069        }
070        boolean override = false;
071        if (args.length == 2 && args[1].equalsIgnoreCase("-f")) {
072            args = new String[]{args[0]};
073            override = true;
074        }
075        if (args.length != 1) {
076            sendUsage(player);
077            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
078        }
079        PlotArea area = this.plotAreaManager.getPlotAreaByString(args[0]);
080        Plot plot2;
081        if (area == null) {
082            plot2 = Plot.getPlotFromString(player, args[0], true);
083            if (plot2 == null) {
084                return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
085            }
086        } else {
087            plot2 = area.getPlotAbs(plot1.getId());
088        }
089        if (plot1.equals(plot2)) {
090            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("invalid.origin_cant_be_target"));
091            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
092        }
093        if (!plot1.getArea().isCompatible(plot2.getArea()) && (!override || !Permissions
094                .hasPermission(player, Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN))) {
095            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("errors.plotworld_incompatible"));
096            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
097        }
098        if (plot1.isMerged() || plot2.isMerged()) {
099            player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("move.move_merged"));
100            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(false);
101        }
102
103        // Set strings here as the plot objects are mutable (the PlotID changes after being moved).
104        String p1 = plot1.toString();
105        String p2 = plot2.toString();
106
107        return plot1.getPlotModificationManager().move(plot2, player, () -> {
108        }, false).thenApply(result -> {
109            if (result) {
110                player.sendMessage(
111                        TranslatableCaption.of("move.move_success"),
112                        TagResolver.builder()
113                                .tag("origin", Tag.inserting(Component.text(p1)))
114                                .tag("target", Tag.inserting(Component.text(p2)))
115                                .build()
116                );
117                return true;
118            } else {
119                player.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("move.requires_unowned"));
120                return false;
121            }
122        });
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public boolean onCommand(final PlotPlayer<?> player, String[] args) {
127        return true;
128    }
129
130}
